title: AE/PR数字转胶片插件FilmConvert Pro 2.12+全摄像机预设包（Win64）
author: 大众脸
content: FilmConvert Pro 是一款将数字摄影机拍摄的素材色彩转换成胶片色彩的工具，可作为独立程序，也可以作为第三方插件。插件支持win系统：After Effects CS5.5,CS6,CC、Premiere CS5.5,CS6,CC。适用素材 RED,DSLR，MOV，内置19种胶片预设，8MM-35MM 镜头噪点设置，操作流程简单，支持4K输出。本插件支持 AE、PR，需要CS5.5以上版本。V2.12版本更新内容（2014.04.03）：新增索尼 F55预设、新增佳能 Canon 5D3 ML Raw预设、新增 BMCC 预设。

other.update_details: Added: Sony F55 profiles. Canon 5Dmk3 ML Raw Profile. BMCC additional profiles for varying exposures.
features: Real Film Grain Add real grain to your footage, and render at up to 4k. Unlike other plugins that simply overlay film grain, FilmConvert realistically models the mount of grain required for each color and exposure level in your image.
Accurate Color Modelling FilmConvert™ models the characteristics of digital sensors, and provides a complex algorithm to transform digital footage to match your favorite film stocks.
